title: Listen Up: 36 Deeply Discounted Summer Items At Nordstrom That'll Sell Out By Month’s End
description: Your stunning summer wardrobe for less.
excerpt: Shop our hand-picked curation of top-tier Nordstrom markdowns that are perfect for the warm weather ahead.
text: Since summer is officially in full swing, it’s time to add some fresh items to your warm-weather fashion options. Nordstrom is the perfect one-stop shop, and recently, the mega retailer has been slashing prices of a selection of top-tier items. I took the hard work out of sifting through the latest markdowns and hand-picked a special curation of seriously amazing fashion items for summer.Yes, I dug through hundreds of sale items to find the cream of the crop for your shopping pleasure. In the mix, you can expect beach-inspired accessories, gorgeous flowy dresses, easy everyday pants, and so much more. Keep scrolling to uncover some seriously great pieces. Manolo Blahnik Callamu Kitten Heel Sandal These baby pink slide on sandals are so cute. Caslon® Wide Leg Pull-On Linen Blend Pants Levi's® Wedgie High Waist Straight Jeans It's officially white denim season. LOULOU DE SAISON Rona Denim Maxi Skirt Simone Rocha Ballerina Grip Flat I love that these flats have a slight sporty vibe. Rails Palm Floral Print A-Line Dress 1774 BIRKENSTOCK Arizona Black Cozy Nylon Sandal This is your sign to update your Birkenstocks. Madewell Cotton Voile Eyelet Miniskirt Pair with breezy tops and cute sandals. Rails Florian Floral Midi Dress Miniature florals are so precious. Jeffrey Campbell Lollipop Kitten Heel Sandal I love the olive green, but these also come in multiple other color ways. Madewell Leilani Linen Dress Throw this on with some slide sandals for a quick summer-friendly look. Steve Madden Dodie Block Heel Sandal Free People Bette Super Slim Capri Pants En Saison Haisley Stripe Cotton Blend Dress I'm a sucker for stripes. Marni Moonlight Slide Sandal NAGHEDI Medium St. Barths Tote A great carry all for a day a the beach. Jeffrey Campbell Fathom Flat Such a pretty square toe. Rails Martine Gingham Smocked Ruffle Crop Top Love this take on gingham. Stella McCartney Spur Pump Free People Lucinda Gingham Check Stretch Cotton Dress Max Mara Moira Pleated Sleeveless Dress I love how versatile this dress can be. Le Specs Monopoly 55mm Rectangular Sunglasses A great everyday pair of sunnies for all your summer adventures. Madewell Stripe Poplin Pull-On Shorts Throw these on with a tank and cute sandals. French Connection Birdie Square Neck Minidress You'll be seeing mini skirts and dresses everywhere. BY ADINA EDEN Ridged Shell Stud Earring Such an unbelievable price point. Vince Camuto Floral Sleeveless Jersey Maxi Dress This dress has a 90s aesthic pdat Havaianas You Spikes Flip Flop Loving the hardware details. Zanatany Concepts Caramel Raffia Beach Tote Bag Such a stunning beach tote. Franco Sarto Tavana Fisherman Sandal Good American Suiting Longer Length Shorts Caslon® Swing Trench Coat Light jackets come in handy when the sun goes down. Levi's® Xl Straight Leg Jeans A pair of blue jeans is always a great idea. Tory Burch Shell Stud Clip-On Earrings BY ADINA EDEN Mother of Pearl Sea Shell Pendant Necklace Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
html:
Since summer is officially in full swing, it’s time to add some fresh items to your warm-weather fashion options. Nordstrom is the perfect one-stop shop, and recently, the mega retailer has been slashing prices of a selection of top-tier items. I took the hard work out of sifting through the latest markdowns and hand-picked a special curation of seriously amazing fashion items for summer.

Yes, I dug through hundreds of sale items to find the cream of the crop for your shopping pleasure. In the mix, you can expect beach-inspired accessories, gorgeous flowy dresses, easy everyday pants, and so much more. Keep scrolling to uncover some seriously great pieces.

Manolo Blahnik

Callamu Kitten Heel Sandal

These baby pink slide on sandals are so cute.

Caslon®

Wide Leg Pull-On Linen Blend Pants

Levi's®

Wedgie High Waist Straight Jeans

It's officially white denim season.

LOULOU DE SAISON

Rona Denim Maxi Skirt

Simone Rocha

Ballerina Grip Flat

I love that these flats have a slight sporty vibe.

Rails

Palm Floral Print A-Line Dress

1774 BIRKENSTOCK

Arizona Black Cozy Nylon Sandal

This is your sign to update your Birkenstocks.

Madewell

Cotton Voile Eyelet Miniskirt

Pair with breezy tops and cute sandals.

Rails

Florian Floral Midi Dress

Miniature florals are so precious.

Jeffrey Campbell

Lollipop Kitten Heel Sandal

I love the olive green, but these also come in multiple other color ways.

Madewell

Leilani Linen Dress

Throw this on with some slide sandals for a quick summer-friendly look.

Steve Madden

Dodie Block Heel Sandal

Free People

Bette Super Slim Capri Pants

En Saison

Haisley Stripe Cotton Blend Dress

I'm a sucker for stripes.

Marni

Moonlight Slide Sandal

NAGHEDI

Medium St. Barths Tote

A great carry all for a day a the beach.

Fathom Flat

Such a pretty square toe.

Rails

Love this take on gingham.

Spur Pump

I love how versatile this dress can be.

Le Specs

A great everyday pair of sunnies for all your summer adventures.

Madewell

Stripe Poplin Pull-On Shorts

Throw these on with a tank and cute sandals.

French Connection

Birdie Square Neck Minidress

You'll be seeing mini skirts and dresses everywhere.

BY ADINA EDEN

Ridged Shell Stud Earring

Such an unbelievable price point.

Vince Camuto

Floral Sleeveless Jersey Maxi Dress

This dress has a 90s aesthic pdat

Loving the hardware details.

Zanatany Concepts

Such a stunning beach tote.

Franco Sarto

Suiting Longer Length Shorts

Caslon®

Swing Trench Coat

Light jackets come in handy when the sun goes down.

Levi's®

Xl Straight Leg Jeans

A pair of blue jeans is always a great idea.

Tory Burch

Shell Stud Clip-On Earrings

BY ADINA EDEN

Mother of Pearl Sea Shell Pendant Necklace

Chinazor "Chichi" Offor is a Georgia-born, Los Angeles–based associate editor who relocated from Brooklyn, New York, and joined Who What Wear's West Coast office in 2022. At WWW, she utilizes over 10 years of editorial experience to dish out shopping advice to the masses and analyze key pop-cultural moments. Chichi previously worked at Refinery29, where she helped revolutionize the brand’s plus-size and inclusive fashion coverage. In her spare time, she’s keeping up with the latest movie releases, enjoying a relaxing day at the spa, or obsessing over her latest ADHD-fueled hyperfixation (e.g., Jesse McCartney's underrated career, the negative effects of bicoastal intellectual elitism, and Gen Z’s loneliness epidemic). You can find her online @thechichio on Instagram.
